title:
Talk with Alexa
Feb 28
name: Talk With Alexa
content:
Machine have gone to the next level of its evolution. Lets talk with Alexa to get our things done.
Timing:9.30 AM to 4.30 PM.

• Introduction to the Alexa Skills Kit
  • Hands-On: Build Your First Alexa Skill
  • Session Attributes
  • Publishing Your Skills
  • Voice Design
  • Gathering Data via Slots
  • Multi-Turn Dialogs
  • Calling External APIs
  • Building Skills with Data Lists
  • Build and Customize the Recipe Skill

title:
Building a Blockchain
Feb 28
name: Building a Blockchain
content:
Book now to delve into the trending technology igniting debates among world leaders.
Timing:9.30 AM to 4.30 PM.

• Introduction to Blockchain.
  • How Blockchain works?
  • Applications of Blockchain.
  • How Can IBM Help Developers Innovate With Blockchain?
  • Hyperledger, a Linux Foundation Project.
  • Getting started with Hyperledger.
  • A brief introduction to Javascript.
  • Creating your first Blockchain application.

title:
Computer Vision: NLP-based
Mar 1
name: Computer Vision: NLP-based
content:
Ever wondered how machines understand our language! Come and join us at Compur Vision: NLP Approach to make your computers draw for you


Timing:9.30 AM to 4.30 PM.

• Introduction to NLP and Computer Vision as entities
  • How NLP and computer vision shares boundaries?
  • What makes NLP a good approach for Vision problems?
  • Hands-on session

The Goal : A futuristic vision.

title:
Linux System Administrator Primer
Mar 1
name: Linux System Administrator
content:
What it takes to secure your server from malicious code and evil hacks? Join us to learn the end to end pipeline of System Administration


Timing:9.30 AM to 4.30 PM.

• Understand need of agility
  • Available Agile Framework
  • Understand DevOps culture and it can be adopted?
  • DevOps practices and tools
  • Role of Development team and Operation team in DevOps
  • Managing Configuration and provisioning servers
  • Managing Infrastructure and Infrastructure as Code
  • Continuous Deployment on Cloud
  • Managing Database and database versioning
